topic.title: Changing the Style of WebHelp Mobile Pages

body.p: You can change the style for your WebHelp Mobile pages by setting a custom theme created with a third-party tool.

To create a custom theme for WebHelp Mobile pages, use the following procedure:
Create a custom theme (the result will be a CSS stylesheet).Use a designer tool, such as the ThemeRoller for jQuery Mobile, to create your own custom theme and then download the resulting CSS stylesheet to use for your WebHelp Mobile pages.
Edit the WebHelp-Mobile transformation scenario and open the Parameters tab.
Specify the path of the downloaded CSS file as the value of the args.css parameter.
Set the value of the args.copycss parameter to yes.
